pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 6, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 6, 2017:

New York City, New York, United States of America

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the CEO of YouTube, Susan Wojcicki.

Bowery Room, Lower Level
Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel
811 7th Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media must arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with women entrepreneurs.

Bowery Room, Lower Level
Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel
811 7th Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media must arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

11:57 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Tina Brown at the Women in the World Summit.

David H. Koch Theater
Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts

Notes for media:

  • Open to Summit-accredited media only
  • Pooled coverage of armchair discussion

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Secretary-General of the United Nations, Ant√≥nio Guterres.

Office of the Secretary-General
Secretariat Building
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on gender parity at the UN with the Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations, Amina J. Mohammed, and representatives of UN Member States.

Secretariat Building
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Bowery Room, Lower Level
Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel
811 7th Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media must arrive no later than 4:30 p.m.
